div.h1: Proving what's possible for Springfield scholars
div.h3: At Veritas Prep, our mission is to prepare scholars in grades 5 through 8 to compete, achieve, and succeed in high school, college, and beyond.

div.data-block-json: {"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/rLUl1AUNjfw\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture\" allowfullscreen></iframe>","resolvedBy":"manual","resolved":true}

div.p: Our scholars are defying expectations in a city where only 1 in 2 children are expected to graduate from high school. As one of the first charter schools in Springfield, we're setting the bar for excellence in one of Massachusetts's most challenged cities.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Our scholars are making extraordinary gains each year. Take a moment to learn more about our scholars' success.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: A central location and affordable housing make Springfield one of the state's most attractive cities for educators.
We value data-driven, reflective educators with a drive to change the status quo in Springfield, MA.
Fill out an application to enter our lottery.
Support our scholars by making a financial contribution.
Find out what's going on at Veritas Prep.
